members.name: getType
members.comment: Returns the class of the class loader. If the bootstrap class loader is represented as null in the Java Virtual Machine (JVM), then null is also the return value of this method.

return: class of the class loader, can be null

members.name: getName
members.comment: Returns the name of the class loader (for example, "boot", "platform", and "app").

return: the class loader name, can be null

members.name: getId
members.comment: Returns a unique ID for the class loader. The ID might not be the same between Java Virtual Machine (JVM) instances.
